Logged on just to thank whoever bootlegged this one – top quality stuff for a CAM / TS copy;  like someone said, some scenes feels like you're watching a dvd;  honestly, i will not be upgrading to a dvd copy until the sequel is out on dvd also – it's that good;  extremely watchable on a 106 - 116cm TV, even 1.5M close.  Xlent work, wish they could be of this calabre.

[ the T.R name is in honour of TPB, not myself ]

Oh yeah, movie's pretty decent too, a go0d prequel to the classic story.
Thanx to all behind the scenes ppl who make it possible & 2 all who seeded (well seeded - i've struggled to get to my usual 3:1 seed ratio!).

[ longlive the bay — tPB4ever ]
